main event: Two men observed a bright orange UFO hovering above Terre Haute, Indiana, for a few minutes on May 13, 1957.
interesting points: The object was round and bright orange, about 40 feet in diameter,It hovered above the trees at an estimated height of 250-300 feet without making any sound,The UFO remained stationary for several minutes, then slowly began to move and disappeared,The sighting was confirmed independently by several other source reports,The object was previously reported in another document as light orange and the shape of a quarter moon.
sighted object: a bright orange round object in the sky
witness description: two men observing the object through binoculars
